ftp_connect_button_clicked: An user connected to a FTP host for .
ftp_disconnect_button_clicked: An user disconnected from the FTP host for .
ftp_download_button_clicked: An user is downloading file(s) from the FTP host for .
ftp_cancel_button_clicked: An user cancelled a download from the FTP host for .
ftp_upload_fail: Request to download from a FTP server by an user failed to save some files to storage.
ftp_upload_success: Request to download from a FTP server by an user finished successfully.
